name: hail2u.net
description: Here is a decent document, a simple translation, and a weblog article about web development. These are written by Kyo Nagashima.
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.postblosxom: git add -- src/weblog/plugins/state/ && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Update cache files"
scripts.css: node bin/sassc.js && node bin/postcss.js && cp -aux tmp/* dist/styles/
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.img: node bin/rasterize.js && convert -quiet tmp/favicon-256.png tmp/favicon-64.png tmp/favicon-32.png tmp/favicon-16.png dist/favicon.ico && cp -aux src/img/* dist/images/
scripts.js: cp -aux src/js/*.js tmp/ && node bin/closure-compiler.js && cp -aux tmp/* dist/scripts/
scripts.test: htmlhint src/css/test.html "src/html/documents/**/*.html" && stylelint --syntax scss "src/css/**/*.scss" && eslint bin/ src/js/
